actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Armed Services.

official_title: A bill to establish the office of Assistant Secretary of Defense for Equal Opportunity, to create an Armed Forces Equal Opportunity Evaluation Board, and for other purposes.
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text: Establishes the office of Assistant Secretary of Defense for Equal Opportunity to eliminate discrimination in the armed forces, including civilian personnel and personnel under defense contractors.

titles.title: A bill to establish the office of Assistant Secretary of Defense for Equal Opportunity, to create an Armed Forces Equal Opportunity Evaluation Board, and for other purposes.
